hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Sun Power - Your trusted partner in solar energy

story.title: About Thadorobot Energy
story.paragraph1: Thadorobot Energy was founded with the belief that solar energy is not only a cost-saving solution but also a way to protect the environment for future generations.
story.paragraph2: With our experienced engineering team and advanced technology, we are committed to delivering high-quality solar energy solutions tailored to each customer's needs.
story.paragraph3: From small-scale projects to large-scale systems, we always prioritize quality and customer satisfaction.

values.title: Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles and values that guide all our activities

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become the leading company in solar energy solutions in Vietnam

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To provide clean, economical and sustainable energy solutions for every household

core_values.title: Core Values
core_values.description: Quality, integrity, innovation and commitment to serve customers best
